headline: Custom Tailoring in Patong
paragraphs: Run by Peter and Jackie, No.1 Armani Suits is a well-established tailor in the heart of Patong, Phuket, with over 25 years of experience in custom tailoring. Located just a short walk from the beach, we combine traditional craftsmanship with honest, personal service.

Each garment is made to measure, cut from quality fabrics and shaped through precise hand measurements. From pattern drafting to final finishing, every piece is refined with attention to balance, proportion and fit.

For those looking for a tailor in Patong they can rely on, we create bespoke suits, shirts, dresses and formalwear, ready in 2–4 days to suit your time in Phuket. Clean lines, careful construction and a fit designed for your body.
We speak Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and English and welcome clients from around the world, whether you’re visiting Phuket on holiday, preparing for a wedding, or building a timeless wardrobe.
